article.title: Cool App-titude: Shoutz
article.author: Rachel Eisenhower
article.abstract: Social networking with a video twist. The mobile-to-mobile video network allows users to share and watch 15-second video clips right from their phones.
article.text: Connect through the world of video with the free Shoutz app for iPhone and Android. The mobile-to-mobile video network allows users to share and watch 15-second video clips right from their phones. Users can engage with friends, family and fans with the new take on social networking. Simply record a quick message and share it with your followers through a one-on-one conversation, a group message or a public display for anyone to see. Users can also comment, rate and re-shout a video instantly. In addition, users can follow celebrities, musicians and sports stars and view their videos. Download the Shoutz app for free from the Android Market or the iTunes App Store.
